page.title: 02OUR COMMUNITY, BONAR BRIDGE
page.content: The{population}of the area of{Bonar {Bridge}ia approximately{600.}It consists of people whose families belong to this area and those who have moved here for reasons of work or retirement. There is no one main industry but many are involved with work on the land in one way or another. Other employments are in forestry, services and tourism. Some men were employed in the oil related industries at Nigg but have been out of work since last year, owing to lack of orders. It is a busy community with a good cross section of age groups, and many activities geared to suit them. It is not particularly remote having the towns of Dornoch and Tain within easy reach and good roads, bus and rail services to Inverness, about an hour's journey away.
